name: Baito Fight
storyline:
From the makers of Hana, comes a life sim RPG for Playdate about living in an apartment complex that's infested with monsters.

Use your sick baseball skills to exterminate monsters from your neighbour's' apartments as a part-time devil hunter!!

Save up money for convenience store runs, and to pay off your overdue rent!!
summary: A daily life sim turn based RPG with baseball elements.
